Verses: 1 idho, Oru Raajaa Needhiyaaga Araasaaluvaar; Prabukkalum Nyaayamaagath Thuraiththanampannuvaargal..
2 avar Kaatrukku Odhukkaagavum, Peruvellaththukkup Pugalidamaagavum, Varanda Nilaththukku Neerkkaalgalaagavum Vidaaiththa Boomikkup Perunkanmalaiyin Nizhalaagavum Iruppaar.
3 appozhudhu Kaangiravargalin Kangal Mangalaayiraadhu; Ketkiravargalin Sevigal Gavaniththe Irukkum.
4 padhatramullavargalin Irudhayam Arivai Unarndhukollum, Thetruvaayarudaiya Naavu Thadaiyindrith Thelivaaip Pesum.
5 moodan Inith Thayaalan Endru Madhikkappadaan; Lobi Ini Udhaaran Endru Sollappaduvadhumillai.

6 enendraal Moodan, Moodaththanaththaip Pesugiraan; Avan Irudhayam Aniyaayaththai Nadappikkum; Avan Maayampanni, Karththarukku Virodhamaai Vibareedham Pesi, Pasiyulla Aaththumaavai Verumaiyaaga Vaiththu, Thaagamullavanukkuth Thaagantheerkkaadhirukkiraan.
7 lobiyin Eththanangalum Pollaadhavaigal; Ezhaigal Nyaayamaaippesumpodhu, Avan Kallavaarththaigalaale Eliyavargalaik Kedukkumpadi Theevinaigalai Yosikkiraan.
8 thayaalagunamullavan Thayaalamaanavaigalai Yosikkiraan, Thayaalamaanavaigalile Nilaiththum Irukkiraan.
9 sugajeevigalaagiya Sthreegale, Ezhundhirundhu En Vaarththaigalaik Kelungal; Nirvisaaramaana Kumaaraththigale, En Vasanaththukku Sevikodungal.
10 nirvisaarigale, Oru Varushamum Sila Naatkalumaaith Thaththalippeergal; Dhraatchappalan Atruppom; Aruppukkaalam Varaadhu.
11 sugajeevigale, Nadungungal; Nirvisaarigale, Thaththaliyungal, Udaiyai Urindhu Kalaindhupottu, Araiyil Rattaik Kattikkollungal.
12 sezhippaana Vayalgalinimiththamum Kanitharum Dhraatcha Sedigalinimiththamum Maaradiththup Pulambuvaargal.
13 en Janaththinudaiya Nilaththilum Kalikoorndhirundha Nagaraththilulla Sandhosham Niraindha Ellaa Veedugalilum, Mutchediyum Nerinjilum Mulaikkum.

14 aramanai Paazhaaga Vidappadum, Janam Niraindha Nagaram Verumaiyaagum, Medum Thurukkamum Endraikkum Kebigalaagum, Avaigal Kaattukkazhudhaigal Kalikkum Idamaayum Mandhaigalukku Meychchalidamaayum Irukkum.
15 unnadhaththilirundhu Nammel Aavi Ootrappadumattum Appadiye Irukkum; Appozhudhu Vanaandharam Sezhippaana Vayalveliyaagum; Sezhippaana Vayalveli Kaadaaga Ennappadum.
16 vanaandharaththile Nyaayam Vaasamaayirukkum, Sezhippaana Vayalveliyile Needhi Thangiththarikkum.
17 needhiyin Kiriyai Samaadhaanamum, Needhiyin Balan Endrumulla Amarikkaiyum Sugamumaam.
18 en Janam Samaadhaana Thaabarangalilum, Nilaiyaana Vaasasthalangalilum, Amaidhiyaaith Thangum Idangalilum Kudiyirukkum.
19 aanaalum Kaadu Azhiya Kalmazhai Peyyum, Andha Nagaram Magaa Thaazhvaaith Thaazhndhupom.
20 maadugalaiyum Kazhudhaigalaiyum Nadaththikkondupoi, Neervalam Porundhiya Idangalilellaam Vidhaividhaikkira Neengal Baakkiyavaangal.
